sim.license-description: Extra500 is free and open source software, licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 2.
sim.long-description: The Extra500 is a small business turboprop powered, six seat aircraft. It is a derivative of the piston powered Extra400 and shares the fully carbon fibre structure as well as the landing gear and some other systems. The pressurized cabin allows cruising up to FL250 at which the efficiency of the RR 250-B17F/2 engine is best.
sim.author: Dirk Dittmann, Eric van den Berg, Thomas Grossberger

key.name: Ctrl-F
key.desc: Pitch control by pitch trim only

key.name: R
key.desc: Put propeller in beta range (for reverse)
